extension.name: Content - Facebook Like And Share
extension.author: Compago
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2013 Compago TLC. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
Facebook Like And Share Joomla Plugin enable Facebook "Like button",the "Share This button", and the Comment Box on your published articles.

If you need some configuration details visit Facebook like and share buttons plugin


Like the plugin? Please Rate it! Thank you!
